name: Dispersion (itch) (Mrsh221)
description:
The game is still in development. It has many bugs. 

It has 2 different endless game scene. 

In infinity mode you should hold mouse left click to destroy colors with the same circle color. (It's a bit difficult. I will change it after my homeworks)

In Gain money mode you should hold mouse left click with white circle to move and escape from obstacles.
